pages.title: The Receiver
pages.text: The Receiver is a block that will receive notes that are transmitted around it and output a Redstone signal if a note matches the Receiver's configured filter criteria.

pages.title: Properties
pages.text: Receivers use the following $(l:3_2properties)Switchboard Properties$():$(br2)- Transmission Source$(br)- MIDI Channels$(br)- Filter Note
